LABEL: 0x42
STRING: The number I rolled was─

LABEL: 0x15F
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x16F
STRING: "1, I see."

LABEL: 0x23B
STRING: I just want to know what possibilities lie in store for that girl.

LABEL: 0x330
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x340
STRING: "A scarred girl, immersed in loneliness and therefore desperate for her one and only love."

LABEL: 0x4DB
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x4EB
STRING: "I wonder what kind of potential had been lying in that girl?"

LABEL: 0x67A
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x68A
STRING: "...Well then, close your eyes."

LABEL: 0x85B
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x89E
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x8FA
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average.

LABEL: 0x943
STRING: I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x990
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x9FF
STRING: We're still second years though. I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0xA74
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, and no one is stupid enough to do anything to stand out from the crowd because they're worried about getting a black mark on their school report.

LABEL: 0xAFD
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0xB7C
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future. Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0xBE3
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0xC56
STRING: "Good morning."

LABEL: 0xC9E
STRING: As I was walking to school, suddenly someone called out to me.

LABEL: 0xD8E
STRING: When I turned around, there was a purple-haired girl standing there with a serene expression on her face.

LABEL: 0xE9F
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0xEAD
STRING: "I'm glad to see you're doing well, Metarou-kun."

LIST.STRING: My girlfriend is cute today as well...

LABEL: 0x107C
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x108A
STRING: "Yes, it's another beautiful day today, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x120D
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x121B
STRING: "Wha... Please don't make fun of me, geez. Isn't that embarrassing...?"

LABEL: 0x131A
STRING: This girl's name is Tsykho, and she's my girlfriend.

LABEL: 0x1369
STRING: We started going out rather recently, after she had transferred to our school, when she confessed her feelings for me.

LABEL: 0x13F6
STRING: Of course, I didn't have a single reason to refuse her, so I accepted her confession.

LABEL: 0x1465
STRING: Rather than that... when we first met, I had a strange feeling that this wasn't my first time meeting Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x14EA
STRING: So I was able to accept her confession easily.

LABEL: 0x1541
STRING: Thinking about it, I must have already fallen for her long before her confession.

LABEL: 0x15AE
STRING: I still can't forget the tearful look of joy on Tsykho's face when I said yes.

LABEL: 0x16BB
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x16C9
STRING: "Today I put your favourite food in this lunch box, will you eat it... for me?"

LABEL: 0x17DA
STRING: Of course. I mean, everything that you make is delicious, so how could I not eat it?

LABEL: 0x18F5
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x1903
STRING: "Is... that true? Eheheh... I'm happy that you said that."

LABEL: 0x1A00
STRING: Tsykho's really a great cook, and since we started dating, I've been eating her homemade lunches with her every break.

LABEL: 0x1A91
STRING: She seems to be good not only at cooking, but at housework in general. My god, she's the ideal girl.

LABEL: 0x1B00
STRING: Not only do we have lunch together every day, but we also head to school and go back together like this.

LABEL: 0x1B7D
STRING: Huh.... really, is it okay for such a good girl to be my girlfriend?

LABEL: 0x1BDC
STRING: I'm sure someone like her's too good for someone like me...

LABEL: 0x1CF3
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x1D01
STRING: "...Ah, Metarou-kun. You just belittled yourself, didn't you?"

LABEL: 0x1E94
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x1EA2
STRING: "You're thinking something like 'Compared to her, I can't match up', right?"

LABEL: 0x1F99
STRING: Ugh... am I busted?

LABEL: 0x2076
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x2084
STRING: "Of course. There's no point in keeping secrets from me."

LABEL: 0x2209
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x2217
STRING: "I know everything there is to know about you, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x2310
STRING: ...Yes, Tsykho's right, when it comes to matters concerning me, she's very sharp.

LABEL: 0x2387
STRING: Almost like she can read my mind.

LABEL: 0x23DA
STRING: I felt as if she could see through everything, but strangely enough I didn't mind that.

LABEL: 0x24EB
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x24F9
STRING: "Sheesh... Listen, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x2680
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x268E
STRING: "I think you are fine just as is, because without Metarou-kun, I'm a completely useless person."

LABEL: 0x2833
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x2841
STRING: "I've finally caught you... so I won't let you go. So please disabuse yourself of any such notion."

LABEL: 0x2954
STRING: My girlfriend is someone who can say horrible things while smiling and laughing cutely.

LABEL: 0x29C1
STRING: ...I guess there's no getting away from this one, huh?

LABEL: 0x2A16
STRING: Normally speaking, when being told off, people would instinctively have a reaction of dislike or rejection.

LABEL: 0x2A89
STRING: I'm not sure how to put it, but when I see how happy Tsykho looks, I don't feel that way.

LABEL: 0x2AF8
STRING: Then suddenly, Tsykho hugged my arm.

LABEL: 0x2BEB
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x2BF9
STRING: "Come on, let's go, Metarou-kun!"

LABEL: 0x2CDE
STRING: Ah, such a sweet exchange, it's a scene that is becoming more and more common.

LABEL: 0x2D3D
STRING: I'm going through a happy routine today as well... together with Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x2D9E
STRING: I guess this everyday life will continue for a long time to come.

LABEL: 0x2DFB
STRING: If that's the case, I'd be very happy.

LABEL: 0x2FE0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2FEE
STRING: "What's up, Metarou, Tsykho-chan?"

LABEL: 0x30D0
STRING: When I entered the classroom, my childhood friend Yukimaru spoke to me.

LABEL: 0x31D1
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x31DF
STRING: "You two are lovey-dovey today too, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x3386
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x3394
STRING: "...Good morning, Yukimaru-san."

LABEL: 0x3513
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3521
STRING: "Hey Tsykho-chan, why did you choose Metarou? I think there are better men out there."

LABEL: 0x36D0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x36DE
STRING: "For example... Look, right here."

LABEL: 0x385E
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x386C
STRING: "Really... You never learn, either. Do you want to go through that harsh lesson, a・ga・in?"

LABEL: 0x3A1F
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x3A2D
STRING: "If possible, I'd rather not have to do such a thing in front of him."

LABEL: 0x3BCA
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3BD8
STRING: "Ugh... hahaha, I'm kidding, I'm kidding!"

LABEL: 0x3D60
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x3D6E
STRING: "Well, then please don't ever say anything like that again."

LABEL: 0x3F07
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x3F15
STRING: "I don't know what I would have done if you hadn't been a friend of Metarou-kun's..."

LABEL: 0x40C2
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x40D0
STRING: "Y-yes, ma'am..."

LABEL: 0x41D1
STRING: Yukimaru then walks up to me and whispers in my ear.

LABEL: 0x42D9
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x42E7
STRING: "Hey, Metarou... You're really going to get stabbed someday, you know? That girl's trouble, I tell you..."

LABEL: 0x43F7
STRING: No matter how I think about it, it's because it's your own fault.

LABEL: 0x444A
STRING: Tsykho's usually not like that at all.

LABEL: 0x4497
STRING: You can't mess with people's girlfriends. Even though it's you, Yukimaru, I'd be pissed too.

LABEL: 0x45A6
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x45B4
STRING: "No, well, I'm sorry, too..."

LABEL: 0x4735
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x4743
STRING: "Jeez, you couples can't take a joke."

LABEL: 0x482F
STRING: It's not a joke when it comes to you and women, that's what.

LABEL: 0x492E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x493C
STRING: "Well, I feel a painful glare coming from Tsykho-chan, so I guess I'll be getting outta here. See you later."

LABEL: 0x4A69
STRING: Yukimaru was right, Tsykho had her gaze set on Yukimaru. If looks could kill...

LABEL: 0x4AF2
STRING: As soon as Yukimaru returned to his seat, Tsykho approached me.

LABEL: 0x4BFA
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: "Are you all right, Metarou-kun? Did he say anything to you?"

LABEL: 0x4CFD
STRING: No, we were just having a chat, don't worry about it.

LABEL: 0x4DF6
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x4E04
STRING: "Well, then that's fine then..."

LABEL: 0x4F7B
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x4F89
STRING: "If he does anything to you, please let me know. I'll help you out...!"

LABEL: 0x507E
STRING: Yep, I got it. Thanks, Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x50CF
STRING: But... Tsykho, I hope you can rely on me more too.

LABEL: 0x512E
STRING: You don't have to keep everything to yourself.

LABEL: 0x521F
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x522D
STRING: "...! ...Y-yes. I'll keep it in mind..."

LABEL: 0x5314
STRING: When I said so, Tsykho's face instantly turned red and looked downwards.

LABEL: 0x5381
STRING: ...I'm the only one who gets to see this side of Tsykho, or rather she'll only show it to me.

LABEL: 0x53FC
STRING: I'm so happy to have her like this all to myself - or so I thought.

LABEL: 0x5576
STRING: ─After school.

LABEL: 0x55AF
STRING: I was on my way home together with Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x5600
STRING: Tsykho and I live in the same apartment building, and our rooms are right next to each other.

LABEL: 0x5667
STRING: I was surprised at first, but now that we've started dating, it's the best thing that could have happened.

LABEL: 0x56DA
STRING: Tsykho and I walk side by side.

LABEL: 0x571F
STRING: It's only a short walk from school to our home, but it's one of the most important times for us.

LABEL: 0x5833
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x5841
STRING: "It's been another day, hasn't it? How was your day, Metarou-kun?"

LABEL: 0x593E
STRING: It's just a normal day, I guess.

LABEL: 0x5999
STRING: Tsykho and Yukimaru are here as usual... nothing has changed, it was just a normal day.

LABEL: 0x5AA8
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x5AB6
STRING: "Just as usual, is it?"

LABEL: 0x5C29
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x5C37
STRING: "Yeah... if you think so, then that must certainly be a good thing. Nothing has changed... and nothing is missing."

LABEL: 0x5DFE
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x5E0C
STRING: "Then surely... that's a good thing, right?"

LABEL: 0x5EED
STRING: ─? What are you talking about all of a sudden, Tsykho?

LABEL: 0x5FDA
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x5FE8
STRING: "Don't mind me, I'm just talking to myself."

LABEL: 0x616B
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6179
STRING: "Come on, let's go home. I'm going to go make dinner again today!"

LABEL: 0x6276
STRING: Ah─Aaah. Yes, that's right.

LABEL: 0x62B9
STRING: I'm looking forward to Tsykho's handmade cooking.

LABEL: 0x63A2
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x63B0
STRING: "Fufu, I'll be working hard on it, so please look forward to it!"

LABEL: 0x64A5
STRING: I stared at Tsykho from the side as she smiles.

LABEL: 0x64F4
STRING: ─Tsykho, my girlfriend who only becomes a "girl" in front of me.

LABEL: 0x6553
STRING: If Tsykho hadn't told me how much she liked me, we wouldn't be in this situation right now...

LABEL: 0x666E
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x667C
STRING: "Hmm? What's wrong, Metarou-kun?"

LABEL: 0x6756
STRING: Tsykho peers into my face with a scowl.

LABEL: 0x68A9
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x68B7
STRING: "......Fuweeh?"

LABEL: 0x6A24
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6A32
STRING: "Ah, a... ho-hold up, Metarou-kun...! It's not fair to say that out of the blue...!"

LABEL: 0x6B3D
STRING: Tsykho's face turns so red, it can't be compared to this morning.

LABEL: 0x6B9E
STRING: Seeing her like that makes me love her even more.

LABEL: 0x6BFB
STRING: Without thinking, I hugged Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x6D0A
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6DF9
STRING: I love you, Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x6E34
STRING: This morning Tsykho said she wouldn't let me go... but truth is, I don't want to leave her either.

LABEL: 0x6EB5
STRING: She's not the only one who doesn't want to let go of her partner..

LABEL: 0x6F22
STRING: So I told her.

LABEL: 0x6F69
STRING: When it comes to your affections, you've got to express it properly.

LABEL: 0x70AF
STRING: The one I love hugs me, he whispers his love to me.

LABEL: 0x7112
STRING: Every word of it is what I've been waiting for, more than anything else in the world.

LABEL: 0x717D
STRING: He brings rain to my parched heart.

LABEL: 0x71D4
STRING: He fills me up.

LABEL: 0x7211
STRING: I can feel his love for me.

LABEL: 0x7260
STRING: ─Ah, I'm so, so happy.

LABEL: 0x72AF
STRING: I can't believe we can be together like this from the very beginning.

LABEL: 0x732A
STRING: It's like a dream.... No, maybe it really is a dream.

LABEL: 0x738F
STRING: But, that's okay.

LABEL: 0x73D2
STRING: Because what's important is not there─but only the scene that is in front of us right now.

LABEL: 0x7497
STRING: Before I knew it this scarred Muscari's wounds have been healed.

LABEL: 0x7504
STRING: The "I" that was self-absorbed, solitary, and seeking only her one true love... as soon as that was fulfilled, "I" have become a very normal human being.

LABEL: 0x75B5
STRING: An ordinary existence, just a maiden in love.

LABEL: 0x7606
STRING: ...If there was "someone" watching this scene, what would they think when they saw the normal me?

LABEL: 0x76A1
STRING: Would they be disappointed? Let down? Or maybe, sympathetic... "I'm glad you're happy", like that?

LABEL: 0x771A
STRING: I don't know anymore─but it doesn't matter anymore.

LABEL: 0x7785
STRING: I'm sure that "someone" watching us doesn't exist, and even if they did, I wouldn't know.

LABEL: 0x780A
STRING: It just crossed my mind for some reason, that's all.

LABEL: 0x786F
STRING: Yes, I'm happy.

LABEL: 0x78B6
STRING: Because my "everything" is looking at me─

LABEL: 0x7923
STRING: So there's nowhere I'd be happier.

LABEL: 0x797A
STRING: I mean─

LABEL: 0x7A11
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7A1F
STRING: "...Yes, I like you, too. I love you."

LABEL: 0x7A9A
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7AA8
STRING: "I love you, more than anyone else in this world..."

LABEL: 0x7B13
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7B21
STRING: "I am the happiest girl in the world to have you all to myself."

LABEL: 0x7B86
STRING: Because the Muscari who was full of scars─has already become the Muscari who was loved.

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: IF-END「Beloved Muscari」

LABEL: 0x7D76
STRING: The number I rolled was─

LABEL: 0x7E93
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x7EA3
STRING: "2, I see."

LABEL: 0x7F6F
STRING: I just want to know what possibilities lie in store for that girl.

LABEL: 0x8064
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x8074
STRING: "A jealous girl with an unfulfilled longing who, in despair, wished for the ruin of others."

LABEL: 0x820D
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x821D
STRING: "I wonder what kind of potential had been lying in that girl?"

LABEL: 0x83AC
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x83BC
STRING: "...Well then, close your eyes."

LABEL: 0x858F
STRING: One morning, in the corner of the classroom.

LABEL: 0x85D4
STRING: I'm sitting at my desk reading a light novel, like I always do.

LABEL: 0x862F
STRING: Whew... This latest issue is a real winner. I was scared to buy the book based on the cover alone, but it was the right decision.

LABEL: 0x86A2
STRING: The protagonist lives with four other girls. One day, they go to the cellar for food... It's the most interesting story I've ever read.

LABEL: 0x876C
STRING: It's got more than a couple of twists; when one is revealed, you'll see the previous parts in a completely new light.

LABEL: 0x87E1
STRING: It's seriously awesome... I need to spread the word about this.

LABEL: 0x88DB
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x88E9
STRING: "What's up, Metarou? You're reading yet another light novel again today."

LABEL: 0x89DD
STRING: And then, my childhood friend, Yukimaru, strikes a conversation with me.

LABEL: 0x8A34
STRING: You've come at the right time, Yukimaru. There's this thing I want to talk to you about...

LABEL: 0x8B33
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x8B41
STRING: "Ah, yes, yes. You're gonna say 'Buy this new issue〜' again, aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x8C3D
STRING: Wha... are you an esper?

LABEL: 0x8D1E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x8D2C
STRING: "You've said the same thing time and time again, of course I can read your mind."

LABEL: 0x8EB5
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x8EC3
STRING: "But that's not the point here! I've got big news!"

LABEL: 0x8FBD
STRING: Big news...?

LABEL: 0x909E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x90AC
STRING: "Listen and be amazed..."

LABEL: 0x9239
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x9247
STRING: "Shit, it's the bell..."

LABEL: 0x93BA
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x93C8
STRING: "Oh well, you'll find out soon enough anyway! See you later!"

LABEL: 0x94E4
STRING: After saying that, Yukimaru went back to his seat. What energy even in morning.

LABEL: 0x954D
STRING: The teacher comes in and homeroom begins.

LABEL: 0x95A2
STRING: Hmm...?

LABEL: 0x95D7
STRING: An unfamiliar woman is standing next to the teacher.

LABEL: 0x96CF
STRING: Instructor

LABEL: 0x96DD
STRING: "Starting from today, we have a new temporary teaching assistant. She'll be observing everyone's classes, so be nice to her."

LABEL: 0x9816
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9828
STRING: "My name is Scykoe, and I'll be working in this class as a teacher-in-training starting from today."

LABEL: 0x99CD
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0x99DF
STRING: "Until my last day here, I'm hoping to get to know you all a lot."

LABEL: 0x9B76
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9B88
STRING: "I know I'm not the best, but please take care of me."

LABEL: 0x9C7E
STRING: What a beautiful person... A prim and proper sort of beauty, I should say.

LABEL: 0x9CCF
STRING: Not only the boys but even the girls gasped at her beauty.

LABEL: 0x9D30
STRING: I see, so this was what Yukimaru was talking about?

LABEL: 0x9D87
STRING: I get excited at the thought that from today, I'm going to be spending time in the company of such a beautiful woman.

LABEL: 0x9EA4
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA01D
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA0F9
STRING: My eyes met with Scykoe-sensei's.

LABEL: 0xA1C8
STRING: She laughed a bit and then quickly returned to her normal expression.

LABEL: 0xA22B
STRING: Wha... what was that just now...?

LABEL: 0xA26E
STRING: I'm just an otaku, I'm going to get the wrong idea about that, so please don't tease me... huh?

LABEL: 0xA2FA
STRING: I thought about it some more when a memory surfaced within me.

LABEL: 0xA35B
STRING: %ZI remembered hearing the name "Scykoe" before.

LABEL: 0xA3B4
STRING: That was─ well, when I was still a little kid... I often played with an older girl in the neighborhood.

LABEL: 0xA439
STRING: Eventually, she moved away, but she made a promise to me.

LABEL: 0xA4A8
STRING: %ZShe said, "When I grow up, I'll become a teacher and teach Mecchan how to study."

LABEL: 0xA521
STRING: That person's name was if I remember correctly...

LABEL: 0xA568
STRING: Scykoe, that's her name.

LABEL: 0xA747
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA759
STRING: "Correct. You properly remembered me after all these years, didn't you, Mecchan?"

LABEL: 0xA84D
STRING: ─Lunchtime. In the staff room.

LABEL: 0xA892
STRING: I was summoned by Scykoe-oneechan... I mean, Scykoe-sensei to have a friendly chat with her.

LABEL: 0xA909
STRING: I was really surprised... Sensei, you come out of nowhere.

LABEL: 0xAA06
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xAA18
STRING: "Heehee, I thought I'd surprise you a bit."

LABEL: 0xABA3
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xABB5
STRING: "And yet... You haven't changed at all. You're still the same as I remember."

LABEL: 0xACB1
STRING: What are you talking about...? Can't you see I've grown up properly?

LABEL: 0xADB2
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xADC4
STRING: I wonder if that's true? Next time, I'll have to check it out... various things, if you know what I mean."

LABEL: 0xAECA
STRING: Scykoe-sensei smiled bewitchingly for a moment.

LABEL: 0xAF1D
STRING: Oh, ooh... Please stop, it's too stimulating for an otaku like me...

LABEL: 0xAF80
STRING: I cough as I switch the topic.

LABEL: 0xAFCD
STRING: Anyway... your dream came true, didn't it, Sensei?

LABEL: 0xB022
STRING: You're so amazing, Scykoe-oneechan.

LABEL: 0xB10B
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB11D
STRING: "Not at all, in fact, I'm just getting started."

LABEL: 0xB2A2
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB2B4
STRING: "Because I'm still an intern... and..."

LABEL: 0xB437
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB449
STRING: "I can't really say I've made it happen until I've taught Mecchan how to study properly."

LABEL: 0xB5F4
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB606
STRING: "So, Mecchan, can you wait just a little longer?"

LABEL: 0xB6FE
STRING: ...Of course, I'll wait for you.

LABEL: 0xB7EF
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB801
STRING: "Yeah, thanks, Mecchan!"

LABEL: 0xB8F7
STRING: The bell has rung, I'd better get back now...

LABEL: 0xB9E8
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB9FA
STRING: "Bye Mecchan, I'll see you later. You have to work hard in class this afternoon too, okay?"

LABEL: 0xBAFA
STRING: I know, I know, I'll see you later, Sensei.

LABEL: 0xBB4B
STRING: And so I left the staff room.

LABEL: 0xBC6C
STRING: ...A boy named Metarou left the staff room.

LABEL: 0xBCC9
STRING: After making sure that the door to the staff room was completely shut, I called out to "her".

LABEL: 0xBD50
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xBD5E
STRING: "...Scykoe."

LABEL: 0xBD9E
STRING: My best friend, my rival.

LABEL: 0xBDE3
STRING: The person... I envied the most in the world.

LABEL: 0xBED7
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xBEE9
STRING: "Kasane..."

LABEL: 0xBFB3
STRING: I know, I know, I'll see you later, Sensei.

LABEL: 0xC004
STRING: And so I left the staff room.

LABEL: 0xC06C
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xC07A
STRING: "Was that the kid you're always talking about just now?"

LABEL: 0xC15B
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC16D
STRING: "Yeah, Mecchan. He's serious, caring... and a very, very sweet boy. Isn't he cute?"

LABEL: 0xC292
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xC2A0
STRING: "You really think so? He's not really my type."

LABEL: 0xC39D
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC3AF
STRING: "Ara, what a shame, but that's okay. I wouldn't be too happy if Mecchan was taken away by you, Kasane."

LABEL: 0xC4D0
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xC4DE
STRING: "...I guess so."

LABEL: 0xC520
STRING: Just because he not my type isn't a reason not to try.

LABEL: 0xC585
STRING: Really, I should try to tempt him just once.

LABEL: 0xC5D8
STRING: I wonder what kind of expression would be on Scykoe's face if I took him away from her, I'm quite curious about that.

LABEL: 0xC643
STRING: Well... having said that, it's not like I'm going to be serious at all.

LABEL: 0xC732
STRING: ─Scykoe and I, who shared the same dream of being a "Teacher", both of us were visiting this school as interns.

LABEL: 0xC7B5
STRING: At one point, I even tried to get off this stage.

LABEL: 0xC812
STRING: Scykoe was a perfect woman, which made me feel inferior when I was standing next to her.

LABEL: 0xC88F
STRING: It was... difficult to say the least.

LABEL: 0xC8E2
STRING: I didn't set out to be a teacher only to have such painful feelings.

LABEL: 0xC94F
STRING: I was jealous, I was envious, I was alienated.

LABEL: 0xC9A6
STRING: It's strange that I'm the only one who has to feel this way.

LABEL: 0xCA09
STRING: So─I thought... that I should just disappear off to somewhere.

LABEL: 0xCA6E
STRING: ─But then.

LABEL: 0xCAA5
STRING: One day, I had a sudden thought.

LABEL: 0xCAF4
STRING: Is this what I wanted?

LABEL: 0xCB31
STRING: It's true that I'm an inferior person, and that I may be a worthless, abnormal existence.

LABEL: 0xCBA6
STRING: But just because it's true... does that mean it's enough of a reason for me to get off the stage?

LABEL: 0xCC19
STRING: That's just "fleeing from reality."

LABEL: 0xCC6C
STRING: ─Why should I give in? It's the world that's wrong.

LABEL: 0xCCDB
STRING: I had a 'dream' and that's why I was working so hard.

LABEL: 0xCD36
STRING: If even that's lost, I've got nothing left.

LABEL: 0xCD99
STRING: .......I didn't want to lose.

LABEL: 0xCDE4
STRING: I don't mind losing to Scykoe. I'm no match for her, I know that much.

LABEL: 0xCE5B
STRING: She's perfect, so even if she looks down on me in her heart... that's okay.

LABEL: 0xCECA
STRING: I didn't want to lose to myself.

LABEL: 0xCF15
STRING: So I remained on the stage.

LABEL: 0xCF5E
STRING: And so now, here I am.

LABEL: 0xCFA9
STRING: Even if it's hard, even if it's painful, I'm going to achieve my dream.

LABEL: 0xD010
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD01E
STRING: "...Well, I'd better get going."

LABEL: 0xD083
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD091
STRING: "You'll have to properly introduce him to me next time."

LABEL: 0xD184
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD196
STRING: "Yeah, of course."

LABEL: 0xD268
STRING: I had just packed up my stuff and was about to leave the staff room.

LABEL: 0xD36B
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD37D
STRING: "...Kasane!"

LABEL: 0xD449
STRING: Scykoe called me to stop.

LABEL: 0xD4A2
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD4B0
STRING: "...What is it?"

LABEL: 0xD58B
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD59D
STRING: "...I'm happy to have made it this far with you, Kasane."

LABEL: 0xD724
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD736
STRING: "So keep up the good work."

LABEL: 0xD825
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD882
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD890
STRING: "...Yeah, I know."

LABEL: 0xD8E7
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xD8F5
STRING: "You too."

LABEL: 0xDA18
STRING: Having answered thus, I headed to the classroom.

LABEL: 0xDA65
STRING: "......Excuse me!"

LABEL: 0xDAA6
STRING: While I was walking down the hallway, someone spoke to me.

LABEL: 0xDB03
STRING: I turned around. Then...

LABEL: 0xDB46
STRING: "Here, you dropped this."

LABEL: 0xDB8B
STRING: The boy... Metarou-kun, was standing there with my pen case in his hand.

LABEL: 0xDC04
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xDC12
STRING: "...Ara, thank you."

LABEL: 0xDC6E
STRING: I tried my best to pretend I didn't know him, and said thank you.

LABEL: 0xDCD5
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xDCE3
STRING: "Class is about to start, why are you still here?"

LABEL: 0xDD4F
STRING: "Actually, the teacher gave me some errands to do... I'm on day duty today."

LABEL: 0xDDCA
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xDDD8
STRING: "I see. Well, then you'd better get going."

LABEL: 0xDE42
STRING: "I will."

LABEL: 0xDE7D
STRING: The conversation over, it looked like he was going to walk away.

LABEL: 0xDED2
STRING: But for some reason, Metarou-kun stayed there, staring at me intently.

LABEL: 0xDF51
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xDF5F
STRING: "...What is it?"

LABEL: 0xDFA1
STRING: "Ah, no, that... Um, Sensei, are you also an intern working here?"

LABEL: 0xE016
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xE024
STRING: "Yes, I'm in charge of a different class than your class."

LABEL: 0xE08E
STRING: "Is that so, I see..."

LABEL: 0xE0E7
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xE0F5
STRING: "...Is that all?"

LABEL: 0xE139
STRING: "No... well, you know, it's funny that I'm talking about this to someone I just met."

LABEL: 0xE1B4
STRING: "When I see people like you actually working hard like this, I just think it's amazing."

LABEL: 0xE23B
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xE28D
STRING: "Actually, I know someone who is also working here as a teaching assistant."

LABEL: 0xE2F4
STRING: "I realized that person has worked so hard to get to where they are today... and I thought that was amazing."

LABEL: 0xE375
STRING: "I don't really have any dreams, I honestly don't know how to get serious about anything or how to work hard..."

LABEL: 0xE402
STRING: "I'm sure you've gone through some hardships and setbacks that I can't imagine..."

LABEL: 0xE481
STRING: "But from my point of view, you look really cool."

LABEL: 0xE4DC
STRING: "I kinda admire it."

LABEL: 0xE537
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xE592
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xE5EE
STRING: "Yes. ...Wait, no, don't get the wrong idea."

LABEL: 0xE649
STRING: "Please forget what I just said, Sensei."

LABEL: 0xE6A2
STRING: "Well, I have to go now so good luck with your work...!"

LABEL: 0xE707
STRING: He said one-sidedly, and this time he walked away for good.

LABEL: 0xE766
STRING: Looking at his back, I remembered Scykoe's words.

LABEL: 0xE7D7
STRING: Instructor Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE7E9
STRING: "Yeah, Mecchan. He's serious, caring... and a very, very sweet boy. Isn't he cute?"

LABEL: 0xE863
STRING: Ahh... He really is.

LABEL: 0xE8A2
STRING: He was stupidly serious when he said those sappy words, so he probably really meant it.

LABEL: 0xE91B
STRING: So... I'm sure I'm an idiot as well for being so affected by those words.

LABEL: 0xE9F6
STRING: Admire, he said.

LABEL: 0xEA39
STRING: The fact that he thought that about me, that he felt that way, is fact, is reality...

LABEL: 0xEAC2
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xEAD0
STRING: "...ku, ugh. Aah..."

LABEL: 0xEB1E
STRING: ─I had always thought I was "below average". "Nothing".

LABEL: 0xEB79
STRING: That I'm someone who can't be anything, a worthless existence.

LABEL: 0xEBCC
STRING: Even so, I've been running and running, eager not to lose to myself.

LABEL: 0xEC3D
STRING: ─At the end of it, those words were waiting for me.

LABEL: 0xECA8
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xED05
STRING: Kasane

LABEL: 0xED13
STRING: "At last, have I finally become 'Something'...?"

LABEL: 0xED6F
STRING: Hey, Scykoe.

LABEL: 0xEDA8
STRING: I've always been so jealous of you, so fed up, so envious, that I've wanted you to disappear for years.

LABEL: 0xEE2B
STRING: But if it weren't for you, I wouldn't have taken it so seriously, to say the least─

LABEL: 0xEEA2
STRING: And in that sense, I'm grateful to you for that.

LABEL: 0xEF01
STRING: Thank you, Scykoe.

LABEL: Custom12
STRING: IF-END「Rewarded Rosemary」

LABEL: 0xF0C6
STRING: The number I rolled was─

LABEL: 0xF1E3
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xF1F3
STRING: "3, I see."

LABEL: 0xF2BF
STRING: I just want to know what possibilities lie in store for that girl.

LABEL: 0xF3B4
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xF3C4
STRING: "A blind girl who gave herself up for the only one she could find."

LABEL: 0xF54D
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xF55D
STRING: "I wonder what kind of potential had been lying in that girl?"

LABEL: 0xF6EC
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xF6FC
STRING: "...Well then, close your eyes."

LABEL: 0xF8CF
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0xF912
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0xF975
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average. I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0xF9F8
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0xFA67
STRING: We're still second years though. I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0xFADE
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, and no one is stupid enough to do anything to stand out from the crowd because they're worried about getting a black mark on their school report.

LABEL: 0xFB61
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0xFBE0
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future. Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0xFC47
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0xFC98
STRING: But─yes.

LABEL: 0xFCD5
STRING: Even though I live life in a half-assed way, it doesn't mean it's a boring life.

LABEL: 0xFD62
STRING: "Me-tarou!"

LABEL: 0xFDA4
STRING: Someone taps me on the shoulder, calling my name in a cheerful voice.

LABEL: 0xFE0D
STRING: Hearing her voice, I couldn't help but smile.

LABEL: 0xFE62
STRING: Slowly, I turned around, and there was─

LABEL: 0xFF5A
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xFF68
STRING: "Good morning, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x10037
STRING: My beloved girlfriend─Psico, was standing there smiling.

LABEL: 0x1016B
STRING: ─A long time ago, when we were still very small.

LABEL: 0x101BE
STRING: Psico once tried to disappear right in front of my eyes...

LABEL: 0x1021B
STRING: ...in order to close my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1025C
STRING: At first I couldn't move as she was about to engulf herself in fire.

LABEL: 0x102C5
STRING: But I didn't want to lose Psico.

LABEL: 0x10314
STRING: So I reached my hand out to Psico.

LABEL: 0x1040C
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1041A
STRING: "Eh... Meta...rou? What are you doing?"

LABEL: 0x104F7
STRING: "I don't want to lose you, Psico."

LABEL: 0x10544
STRING: "Don't disappear right in front of me."

LABEL: 0x10595
STRING: "Didn't you say, we'll be together forever?"

LABEL: 0x10688
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x10696
STRING: "─Meta...rou."

LABEL: 0x107FF
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1080D
STRING: "I... ...don't want to leave... that's why... I want it to stay like this, forever..."

LABEL: 0x10916
STRING: "I promise. I'll... never leave you, Psico."

LABEL: 0x1096F
STRING: "So please... live, and stay beside me."

LABEL: 0x10A66
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x10A74
STRING: "...Really? You'll never... leave me?"

LABEL: 0x10B53
STRING: "Of course."

LABEL: 0x10B8C
STRING: "Because you're... my everything."

LABEL: 0x10C7F
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x10DFA
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x10E08
STRING: "Me too... Metarou...!"

LABEL: 0x10EE5
STRING: After saying that, our hands connected.

LABEL: 0x10F34
STRING: In order to never leave each other.

LABEL: 0x10F71
STRING: Like an engraving in our hearts, so that we'll always be together─

LABEL: 0x110C2
STRING: ─And now, the present.

LABEL: 0x11101
STRING: Since then, Psico and I lived like normal, grew up like normal, and are now attending the same high school.

LABEL: 0x11231
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1123F
STRING: "Ehehe..."

LABEL: 0x11306
STRING: Apparently, Psico is in a good mood today.

LABEL: 0x11351
STRING: I wonder if something happened? Let's try asking her.

LABEL: 0x11460
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1146E
STRING: "No, I was just thinking how Metarou's by my side today as well."

LABEL: 0x115FD
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1160B
STRING: "That's what's making me so happy."

LABEL: 0x11782
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x11790
STRING: "The days I took for granted are so important to me now."

LABEL: 0x1188F
STRING: She says that and grabs my arm.

LABEL: 0x11986
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x11994
STRING: "I love you, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x11A67
STRING: My girlfriend's such a sweetheart, and I love her so much.

LABEL: 0x11AB4
STRING: The warmth that is transmitted to my arm is unmistakably that of a living person.

LABEL: 0x11B23
STRING: For some reason─I can't help it, but I feel like I'm going to cry.

LABEL: 0x11C49
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x11C57
STRING: "Hey, Metarou, Psico-chan."

LABEL: 0x11D37
STRING: As we were walking, he called out to me from behind.

LABEL: 0x11D90
STRING: My childhood friend Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x11E75
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x11E83
STRING: "Good morning, Yukimaru."

LABEL: 0x11FF0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x11FFE
STRING: "As usual you two are going at it as soon as the sun rises. Go die in a fire."

LABEL: 0x12194
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x121A2
STRING: "Heehee, are you jealous?"

LABEL: 0x1230F
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1231D
STRING: "Well of course. How could anyone not be jealous of being able to go to school in the morning with a beauty in hand like Psico-chan?"

LABEL: 0x124D4
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x124E2
STRING: "Really, I don't know what you like about this dull guy."

LABEL: 0x125D2
STRING: You're annoying, get lost.

LABEL: 0x126B5
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x126C3
STRING: "Heehee, well that's the thing, Yukimaru. It's because Metarou and I, we'll alwaaaaays be together."

LABEL: 0x12868
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x12876
STRING: "It always has been, and always will be... right?"

LABEL: 0x129F1
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x129FF
STRING: "Right, Metarou?"

LABEL: 0x12AC8
STRING: Ah, that's right.

LABEL: 0x12BA5
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x12BB3
STRING: "What's up with that? That didn't sound like an answer to me. And please don't finish each other's sentences.

LABEL: 0x12D61
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x12D6F
STRING: "Well, that's how it is. More importantly, come on, let's get going, we're going to be late."

LABEL: 0x12F04
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x12F12
STRING: "Oh man, it's already this late? Let's go, you two!"

LABEL: 0x13021
STRING: Yukimaru runs, looking flustered.

LABEL: 0x13072
STRING: As if following his lead, Psico withdrew her hand from mine.

LABEL: 0x1318F
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1319D
STRING: "Let's go, Metarou. Together... okay?"

LABEL: 0x1327E
STRING: I looked her firmly in the eye─and nodded, laughing.

LABEL: 0x133FF
STRING: ─After school.

LABEL: 0x13438
STRING: Psico and I left school and went to visit a place.

LABEL: 0x13499
STRING: It's a special place for the two of us.

LABEL: 0x134EC
STRING: Our paradise.

LABEL: 0x13529
STRING: The ruin that we called a paradise welcomes us again today.

LABEL: 0x1358A
STRING: Now that we're grown up, we still keep coming back here.

LABEL: 0x135EF
STRING: Why? I don't exactly understand the reason myself.

LABEL: 0x1363A
STRING: I'm sure that by doing this, we are affirming each other.

LABEL: 0x136A5
STRING: A reminder to never leave each other's presence.

LABEL: 0x1379D
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x137AB
STRING: "Today was tiring too, right, Metarou?"

LABEL: 0x13920
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1392E
STRING: "Why is school so tiring?"

LABEL: 0x13AB5
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x13AC3
STRING: "It's the same thing over and over again, with no change at all."

LABEL: 0x13C58
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x13C66
STRING: "But... I wonder why? This... makes me feel so very happy."

LABEL: 0x13D69
STRING: With that, Psico smiles at me.

LABEL: 0x13DB8
STRING: That smile is really endearing...

LABEL: 0x13EA5
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x13EB3
STRING: "─Hey, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x13F80
STRING: Psico called out my name.

LABEL: 0x14067
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14075
STRING: "I'm so happy right now."

LABEL: 0x141F0
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x141FE
STRING: "I was able to be Metarou's number one, and Metarou looks at me and me only..."

LABEL: 0x14399
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x143A7
STRING: "I'm truly happy to be alive and by your side."

LABEL: 0x1453E
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x1454C
STRING: "Heh heh, isn't this funny?"

LABEL: 0x14627
STRING: That's not true, because... I feel the same way.

LABEL: 0x14680
STRING: What Psico was feeling, I felt it too.

LABEL: 0x146D5
STRING: I'm so glad you're alive and we can spend time together like this. It's an unbearable happiness.

LABEL: 0x14742
STRING: That was the right thing to do... Yes, I thought so.

LABEL: 0x1479B
STRING: ─It's just a day like usual. Every day, nothing changes.

LABEL: 0x147EE
STRING: We will live life naturally, and we will die naturally.

LABEL: 0x1484D
STRING: This is good, this is what I wanted.

LABEL: 0x1489A
STRING: I don't need a dramatic story.

LABEL: 0x148E1
STRING: For example, if there was a future... in which I, who was unable to save Psico at that time, became obsessed with delusions and broke down.

LABEL: 0x1497E
STRING: That would have ended in madness, I'm sure.

LABEL: 0x149D7
STRING: But that didn't happen to "me".

LABEL: 0x14A26
STRING: Psico is indeed alive, and she's still standing next to me.

LABEL: 0x14A87
STRING: ─And that's enough for me.

LABEL: 0x14B35
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14B43
STRING: "Hey, Metarou. I'll always be by your side."

LABEL: 0x14BBC
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14BCA
STRING: "I won't think about dying and closing your eyes ever again."

LABEL: 0x14C87
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14C95
STRING: I've decided that I'm going to live and be by Metarou's side... forever.

LABEL: 0x14D22
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14D30
STRING: "So this will be... Our new『Promise』."

LABEL: 0x14DEF
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14DFD
STRING: "So... hey, Metarou. Shall we make a vow?"

LABEL: 0x14E6C
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14E7A
STRING: "Swear on this clover... That the two of us will live... and be together, forever?"

LABEL: 0x14EEB
STRING: ─Yes. I promise. I solemnly swear on it.

LABEL: 0x14F98
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x14FA6
STRING: "...Yes, yes! Always, always─be by my side."

LABEL: 0x15017
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x15025
STRING: "Look only at me."

LABEL: 0x15082
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x15090
STRING: "I too will look only at Metarou. Ehehe."

LABEL: 0x1514B
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x15159
STRING: "From now on, let's live together. I love you, Metarou."

LABEL: Custom22
STRING: IF-END「An Ordinary Clover」
